attributes.action: Make it certain that when a family/woman/man finds the courage and leaves a domestic violence situation,they are not then "lost" in the system, but are given every avenue of help from every goverment  organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not only a traumatic and very hard time for anybody who leaves a domestic violent situation, it is also very hard to get help and support once you have left. I would like organisations such as: social services, income support, housing, counseling services, and every other organisation that is needed for help to really make changes so as they can give 100% support and help to the victims who have to leave there homes, possessions friends, family, to secure a safe, stable and happy life.
